comments.author: Eridan_world
comments.body: Will owning your NFTs give you any benefits?

comments.author: alhyudien
comments.body: Will you make this game 3D and make it PVP? Or make this game like adventure game with some final choices? happy ending, sad ending or something else. I think if only happy ending it's not exciting for some people.

comments.author: Baoo
comments.body: Quote from: Eridan_world on September 27, 2022, 09:03:07 AMWill owning your NFTs give you any benefits?Hey there.Give ‘you’ or give ‘me’?Can you confirm it?

comments.author: Baoo
comments.body: Quote from: alhyudien on September 27, 2022, 01:23:18 PMWill you make this game 3D and make it PVP? Or make this game like adventure game with some final choices? happy ending, sad ending or something else. I think if only happy ending it's not exciting for some people.  Hey mate, hope you're doing well.It will be an RPG but about the sad or happy ending part we won’t disclose until it is the right time.Stay tuned for upcoming events.Have a great weekend!

comments.author: MMOStars
comments.body: They will let you know when your NFTs go to 0 and become worthless.

comments.author: Baoo
comments.body: Quote from: MMOStars on October 02, 2022, 12:42:19 AMThey will let you know when your NFTs go to 0 and become worthless. I will let you know when our NFTs go to the moon and become profitable & famous
